title: List of all Android support  versions libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android support  versions libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: BufferTextInputLayout
repoList.description: A simple customised version of the TextInputLayout from the Android Design Support Library ⌨️

repoList.name: adt-leanback-support
repoList.description: Eclipse ADT compatible versions of the android leanback libraries and support libraries.

repoList.name: SubtitleForAndroid
repoList.description: Subtitle For Android is a multi-subtitle support library for Android platform video playback. It supports almost all Android versions, and supports subtitle files in. SRT,. SCC,. ASS,. STL,. TTML formats.

repoList.name: AudioBookLibrary
repoList.description: Generalised version of EKonyvtarAudio to support multiple flavors and catalogs

repoList.name: moves-android-api-library
repoList.description: Moves API library to use with android. (Supports Android version 2.2 and above)

repoList.name: SupportCamera
repoList.description: [Android Library] Support library to handle camera api on all android versions

repoList.name: leanback-v17
repoList.description: Forked version of leanback-v17 Android library, for Android TV support

repoList.name: Android-Fingerprint-API
repoList.description: A modified version of Google's Fingerprint API sample project that uses the support library for backwards compatibility.

repoList.name: RoundedLayout
repoList.description: This is a library that has a rounded cut of View, support whether the specified corners are cropped and add a custom Border, and add a shadow support from API 9, which is based on FrameLayout, that is, His Child can be any View, the current library or preview version, if you encounter problems in the process can submit issue or pr.

repoList.name: safe-android-fragments
repoList.description: The goal of this example is to show you a way to prevent the fragment state loss and consequently avoid potential crashes of your app using kotlin extensions and android support library (version up to 26.0.0).
